questions.question: Have you seen an interesting TV documentary recently that you learnt a lot from? Write us a review of the documentary. You should explain what the documentary was about, tell us what you learnt from it and say whether other people would find it interesting too.
questions.context: You recently saw this notice on an English-language website called TV Gold.
questions.announcement: Reviews wanted: A TV documentary I learnt a lot from.
keyPoints: Explain what the documentary was about
Tell us what you learnt from it
Say whether other people would find it interesting

questions.question: Write us a review of a concert you've been to. It could be a pop, rock or classical concert, or one with a different type of music. Include information on the music, the place and the atmosphere.
questions.context: You recently saw this notice on an English-language website called Music Live.
questions.announcement: Reviews Wanted! A concert I've been to
keyPoints: Information on the music
Information on the place
Information on the atmosphere

questions.question: Write us a review of a restaurant where you had a wonderful meal. Tell us what the restaurant was like, describe what you ate and explain why it was so good.
questions.context: You see this notice in an English-language website called Restaurant World.
keyPoints: Tell us what the restaurant was like
Describe what you ate
Explain why it was so good

questions.question: We're looking for reviews of organised holidays where people can practise sports. Write a review of the holiday, including information about the place, the sports, and how well organised the holiday was.
questions.context: You have seen this notice in an online holiday magazine.
keyPoints: Information about the place
Information about the sports
How well organised the holiday was

questions.question: We're looking for reviews of a good guidebook to your city or country. In your review you should include information about: the contents of the book, what makes the book useful and interesting, why it's better than similar guidebooks.
questions.context: You have seen this notice on a travel website.
keyPoints: The contents of the book
What makes the book useful and interesting
Why it's better than similar guidebooks

questions.question: We are looking for reviews of restaurants which are good places to celebrate special occasions. In your review you should: describe the restaurant and the food it serves, say what special occasions you would recommend the restaurant for.
questions.context: You have seen this notice in a magazine.
questions.announcement: Reviews wanted: Restaurants for special occasions
keyPoints: Describe the restaurant and the food it serves
Say what special occasions you would recommend the restaurant for

questions.question: Write us a review of a useful book which you have read. In your review describe what the book is about, explain how it was useful to you and say why you would recommend it to others.
questions.context: You recently saw this notice in a magazine.
keyPoints: Describe what the book is about
Explain how it was useful to you
Say why you would recommend it to others

questions.question: We're looking for reviews of smartphone apps that you find really useful. Write a review describing what the app does, explaining why you find it useful and saying whether you would recommend it to other people.
questions.context: You see this announcement on an English-language technology website.
keyPoints: Describe what the app does
Explain why you find it useful
Say whether you would recommend it to other people

questions.question: Have you seen a film recently where the main character behaved in a surprising way? Write us a review of the film, explaining what the main character did and why it was surprising. Tell us whether or not you would recommend this film to other people.
questions.context: You see this announcement in your college English-language magazine.
keyPoints: Explain what the main character did
Explain why it was surprising
Say whether you would recommend this film

questions.question: We are looking for articles about how a visitor could have a great time in a city in your country in just one day. Write us an article telling us what a visitor can do, what they can see and how they can travel around.
questions.context: You see this announcement on an English-language travel website.
questions.announcement: Articles wanted! A day in the city!
keyPoints: What a visitor can do
What they can see
How they can travel around
questions.note: This is technically an article, but can be adapted as a review of a city

questions.question: Have you played a video game recently that you found particularly addictive? Write a review describing the gameplay, the graphics and what makes it so compelling. Would you recommend it to other gamers?
questions.context: You see this announcement on a gaming website.
keyPoints: Describe the gameplay
Describe the graphics
Explain what makes it compelling
Say whether you would recommend it
questions.note: This is based on common Cambridge review patterns

questions.question: We're looking for reviews of hotels where you've stayed recently. Write a review describing the hotel facilities, the service and the location. Would you recommend it to other travellers?
questions.context: You see this announcement on a travel website.
keyPoints: Describe the hotel facilities
Describe the service
Describe the location
Say whether you would recommend it
questions.note: This is based on common Cambridge review patterns

paragraph1.name: Introduction
paragraph1.purpose: Identify what you're reviewing and give brief context

paragraph2.name: Feature 1
paragraph2.purpose: Describe first main aspect (usually from question requirements)

paragraph3.name: Feature 2
paragraph3.purpose: Describe second main aspect (usually from question requirements)

paragraph4.name: Recommendation
paragraph4.purpose: Give clear recommendation and final opinion

examTips: Always answer ALL the points in the question
Use appropriate review language and discourse markers
